4309900.name: Rushcraft
4309900.description:
Rushcraft is a fast-paced fantasy adventure where time is your most precious resource.

You are a wandering mage who stumbles upon a forgotten castle at the edge of a mysterious forest. Inside its ruined halls lie abandoned crafting stations, old alchemical devices, and the promise of powerful magical creations.

Each Day Is a Race Against the Clock

Venture into the forest to gather rare resources, uncover hidden paths, and collect valuable loot. Then return to the castle to craft magical items, tools, and gadgets using the equipment youâ€™ve restored. Finally, sell your creations to fund your next expedition and push deeper into the unknown.

Time is limited. Every decision matters.

You only have a short window to explore, and an equally tight schedule to craft. Spend too long searching the forest, and you may miss your chance to refine your loot. Focus too much on crafting, and the forestâ€™s secrets may slip through your fingers. Master the balance, and you may uncover the mysteries hidden within both the castle walls and the forest beyond.

Plan carefully, move quickly, and spend your time wisely.
Only the most efficient mages will unlock the forestâ€™s deepest secrets.
